page.title: 05MOBILITY AND EMPLOYMENT
page.content: WE TOOK A SAMPLE OF 56 PUPILS IN THE FIRST YEAR AT RYEISH GREEN AND IN THE 56 PUPILS' HOMES THERE WERE 136 PEOPLE AGED 16+.OF THE 136,118 ARE EMPLOYED,6 ARE UNEMPLOYED,6 ARE RETIRED AND 6 ARE IN EDUCATION.OF THE 118 EMPLOYED 3 ARE IN PRIMARY,27 ARE IN SECONDARY,AND 88 ARE IN TERTIARY EMPLOYMENT.79 OF THE 118 EMPLOYED WORK WITHIN 5 MILES OF READING,22 WORK IN OTHER PARTS OF BERKSHIRE AND 17 WORK OUTSIDE BERKSHIRE.OF THE 118 EMPLOYED 74 TRAVEL TO WORK BY CAR,25 WALK TO WORK, 11 CYCLE TO WORK,6 TRAVEL BY BUS,AND 2 TRAVEL BY TRAIN.OF THE 56 PUPILS,35 WERE BORN IN BERKSHIRE AND 21 WERE BORN OUTSIDE BERKSHIRE.THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF YEARS PUPILS HAVE BEEN LIVING IN THEIR PRESENT HOME IS 5.6 YEARS.20% OF THE 56 PUPILS HAVE MOVED TO LIVE IN BERKSHIRE IN THE LAST FIVE YEARS.
